name: Dreamberry Island
description:
Come and visit the wonderful Dreamberry Island where strange trees grow. 

You'll discover their magical berries that will let you explore marvelous dreamlands whenever you like.

-----------------------------------

This game was made during A Game By Its Cover game jam. It is inspired by fictional cartridge cover art designed by David Kraus for the My Famicase Exhibition 2018.

-------------------------------------------------------

Two of the dreamlands you'll explore are based on dreams that 88ukiyo and Tartle Wizard had the courtesy to share :)
